reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress visually appealing, with one noting it looks like an expensive piece, and appreciate its thick fabric that feels nice. The dress is comfortable, true to size, and perfect for special occasions like graduations and school dances. Customers like the square neckline, and one mentions it flatters their shape without being too tight. While some customers find it fits perfectly, others note it's no

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, comfortable, true to size, and perfect for a teenage girl!
items.body: Fits true to size, great quality. Beautiful dress, my teenage daughter wore it to her semi formal and it was gorgeous. She said it was very comfortable and loved it. The material was flowy and not too heavy, yet not cheap. Read more
items.author: Marano Family

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ðŸ‘ ðŸ‘ Stretchy in all the right placesâ£ï¸
items.body: ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ True to product pic in both cut & color ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Great price ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Flared skirt adds a great hour glass look ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Stretch makes it super comfy ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Most stretchy dress fabrics look incredibly cheap and this one does not even appear to be the typical plastic stretch fabric at all. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Great for accomidating a bigger busted woman but you could definitely wear a padded bra. ðŸ’–This dress is AMAZINGâ£ï¸ Thank you to all the ladies who posted a pic as I was able to find the right size in the first try. The fabric of the dress is thick but incredibly forgiving in its stretch making it insanely comfortable to wear & accommodates different body types and very different bust sizes. ðŸˆ I do think that you need a B size cup to fill out the bust area but as you can see from the pictures anyone from a B size to a DD can fit in the medium dress. Iâ€™m pairing it with a lightweight summer sweater that doesnâ€™t work with a bow in the back. Thankfully the length of the fabric for the bow is long enough for me to cross it in the back & make a small tie up front under my bust. Read more
items.author: D

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute style and comfy durable fabric!
items.body: Great durable quality fabric and fits well on body with a cute flare. The bow is so cute! The dress is short; I needed to buy matching spandex to wear underneath. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Grad Dress!
items.body: beautiful dress that looks and feels a lot more expensive than it is! wore it for college graduation and i loved it, perfect length and fabric. Read more
items.author: LJS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dress
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and very sexy! It has thick material and didnt get wrinkly in my suit case. I am a tall girl so I had to wear black bike shorts under or my whole rear end would have been out so tall girls be aware of that! The neckline is very flattering for bustier girls as well Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit.
items.body: Iâ€™m really happy with this dress! The quality is great and it looks just like the pictures. I needed it quickly for a cruise and it arrived right on time. The fit is perfect and the size was exactly as described. Definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: Femia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars cute but very short
items.body: the dress itself is nice, definitely wrinkle resistant, the size was perfect everywhere except length. the color was exactly as pictured. had my mom try it on too, just to see if it looked longer on her but alas, if youâ€™re taller than 5â€™8 i wouldnâ€™t recommend unless youâ€™re used to super short dresses. Read more
items.author: Peach

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes to the black dress!!!!
items.body: Outstanding !! I bought this dress for my daughterâ€™s work event. It fit her beautifully! A little steam knocked the wrinkles out, the length was just above the knee, the straps had abilities to tighten if needed, gorgeous bow to tie in back. Fabrick had some stretch and very comfortable. The price was great. I looked at alot of more expensive dresses that didnâ€™t compare. Nice flow to skirt. Perfect for figure flattering. Donâ€™t think twice!! I know I am borrowing it!!! Read more
items.author: Kathleen Z.

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Winered, Navy, Pink, Violet, White, Yellow, Peacock Blue, Rose, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
